abstract: Duration Capital, one of several hedge funds forced to sell hundreds of millions of dollars of municipal bonds when their bets went awry, is severing its links with its main prime broker, JPMorgan Chase, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Duration Capital, one of several hedge funds forced to sell hundreds of millions of dollars of municipal bonds when their bets went awry, is severing its links with its main prime broker, JPMorgan Chase, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Duration Capital Said to Cut All Ties With JPMorgan
